text: 36:11 Jeremaia 31:27; Esekiel 35:9; 37:6; 37:13Kɨ ian itir gumazamiziba ko asɨziba bar dar amightɨ, dar dɨbobonim mavanangam. Ian dɨbobonim bar ghuavanaboghtɨ, gumazamiziba bar avɨrasemegham. Kɨ ia damightɨ, gumazamiziba ian danganir mɨkebaba bar dar ikiam, mati ia fomɨra ikezɨ moghɨn ikiam. Eghtɨ ian dabirabim bar deragham, egh ia fomɨra ikezɨ dabirabim bar a gafiragham. Eghtɨ ia kamaghɨn fogh suam, kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God.
